title:
Heuristic Planner for Communication-Constrained Multi-Agent Multi-Goal
  Path Planning
abstract:
In robotics, coordinating a group of robots is an essential task. This work
presents the communication-constrained multi-agent multi-goal path planning
problem and proposes a graph-search based algorithm to address this task. Given
a fleet of robots, an environment represented by a weighted graph, and a
sequence of goals, the aim is to visit all the goals without breaking the
communication constraints between the agents, minimizing the completion time.
The resulting paths produced by our approach show how the agents can coordinate
their individual paths, not only with respect to the next goal but also with
respect to all future goals, all the time keeping the communication within the
fleet intact.
